CustomField.formula: IF(($Profile.Name == 'Customers' || $Profile.Name == 'PRM Partner Community User Login' || $Profile.Name == 'PRM Partner Relationship Manager Login' || $Profile.Name == 'Customers Login'),HYPERLINK("/support/s/case/"+Id, CASE(RecordType.DeveloperName, 'HWS_Parent_Case', CaseNumber , 'HWS_Parent_Case_Ready_Only', CaseNumber, Subject)),HYPERLINK("/"+Id+"?pv0="+Id, CASE(RecordType.DeveloperName,'HWS_Parent_Case', CaseNumber , 'HWS_Parent_Case_Ready_Only', CaseNumber, Subject),"_self"))
CustomField.label: Support Ticket Reference
